title: Agentic AI Use Cases for Financial Services Companies
summary:
The webpage details several high-ROI agentic AI use cases for financial services companies, which include **automated due diligence & data room analysis**.

Specifically, the **Automated due diligence & data room analysis agent** is described as a multi-agent system that:
* Ingests VDRs (Virtual Data Rooms), reads contracts and financials.
* Compiles a diligence report highlighting anomalies, covenants, risks, and open questions.
* **Cuts diligence time from 3–4 weeks to 3–5 days.**

This directly addresses the due diligence use case mentioned in your query. The page also mentions agentic AI use cases spanning deal sourcing, financial modeling, and post-deal monitoring, which are relevant to private equity and financial contexts.
